video.title: 黒執事
video.synopsis: In Victorian London, 12-year-old business magnate Ciel Phantomhive thwarts dangers to the queen as he's watched over by his demon butler, Sebastian.

episodes.synopsis: The Phantomhive estate bustles with preparations for an important meeting between the Young Master and a slithering captain of industry. The maid, the gardener and the cook are fools, but the Butler is a man of hidden talents.
episodes.title: His Butler, Able

episodes.synopsis: Plans to suppress an uprising of the vermin variety are put on hold when the Young Master is abducted. The Butler is obligated to act decisively in such matters, and no one sets the table better than Sebastian.
episodes.title: His Butler, Strongest

episodes.synopsis: When the Young Master's financée drops by for an unannounced visit, the Phantomhive Estate experiences a sickening outbreak of "cuteness." Meanwhile, the Butler has his hands full with a suicidal apprentice.
episodes.title: His Butler, Omnipotent

episodes.synopsis: The Young Master dons an evening gown to apprehend a monster who's been butchering women of the night, but if his talent for cross-dressing is discovered, the Phantomhive name will be irreversibly sullied.
episodes.title: His Butler, Capricious

episodes.synopsis: The Butler and his Young Master scour the seedy back alleys of London in search of an infamous butcher. Imagine their surprise upon discovering that the ripper may actually be a reaper!
episodes.title: His Butler, Chance Encounter

episodes.synopsis: Sebastian continues his gruesome battle with the rogue reaper, and the Young Master takes special care to ensure that his beloved aunt is buried in the proper colors.
episodes.title: His Butler, at the Funeral

episodes.synopsis: At the behest of the Queen, the Young Master and his underlings travel to a dreary land supposedly haunted by a demon dog. This new mission makes the Butler uneasy, but he's always been more of a cat person.
episodes.title: His Butler, Merrymaking

episodes.synopsis: The Butler puts on an exhibition on the art of training demonic canines to shake, roll over and refrain from terrorizing gloomy villages. Meanwhile, the Gardener gets his first painful taste of love.
episodes.title: His Butler, Training

episodes.synopsis: The Young Master's latest acquisition is a haunted camera that can photograph beings not of this world. Calamities are sure to follow when the servants set out to snap a shot of the elusive Butler.
episodes.title: His Butler, Phantom Image

episodes.synopsis: Already a man of many talents, the Butler adds ice sculpting to his repertoire in an attempt to acquire a priceless-but-cursed gem for his Young Master.
episodes.title: His Butler, on Ice

episodes.synopsis: When his betrothed is abducted by a deranged doll maker, the Young Master travels to London to investigate. Little does he know, the search will be complicated by a lovesick reaper who's lost his scythe.
episodes.title: His Butler, However You Please

episodes.synopsis: The Master's birthday approaches, but rescuing Elizabeth is of far greater importance than celebrating. A vile puppeteer is terrorizing London, and only the Butler can cut down his army of marionettes.
episodes.title: His Butler, Forlorn

episodes.synopsis: A postcolonial conflict boils over when an Indian prince visits the Phantomhive estate. Later, the Butler's prowess with a blade is unexpectedly matched by his foreign counterpart.
episodes.title: His Butler, Freeloader

episodes.synopsis: Prince Soma has been betrayed by his manservant, and the Butler must put his hellish talents to the test in a curry-cooking competition against the blessed right hand of an Indian deity.
episodes.title: His Butler, Supremely Talented

episodes.synopsis: The Queen is on hand as the Butler wages culinary warfare against Prince Soma's royal servant. The competition reaches an unprecedented level of ferocity when someone's secret ingredient unleashes the demon god of curry.
episodes.title: His Butler, Competing

episodes.synopsis: When the Young Master is defeated in a supernatural chess match, he must surrender his most prized possession to a ghostly prince. Locating a very old and very specific skull is the key to bringing Sebastian back.
episodes.title: His Butler, in an Isolated Castle

episodes.synopsis: The Queen orders young Master Phantomhive to investigate reports of a cult that promises to "purify" its unclean members. The mission is complicated by the appearance of a familiar reaper.
episodes.title: His Butler, Offering

episodes.synopsis: An angel abducts Ciel and attempts to rewrite his unhappy memories of the past. The Butler is powerless to assist, but fortunately, the Young Master has an unhealthy attachment to his hatred.
episodes.title: His Butler, Transmitted

episodes.synopsis: There's a potent new drug plaguing the backstreets of London, and it's being sold in stolen Phantomhive candy wrappers. The Young Master is being set up, but what manner of man wants him to take the fall?
episodes.title: His Butler, Imprisoned

episodes.synopsis: While the Young Master continues his investigation into the opium-filled counterfeit candy wrappers, the Butler is chained and tortured in the Tower of London.
episodes.title: His Butler, Escaping

episodes.synopsis: A series of flashbacks reveals the secret pasts -- and hidden talents -- of the Phantomhive staff. While the servants go about their daily duties, the Young Master gives a chess lesson to a pretty lady.
episodes.title: His Butler, Engaging Servants

episodes.synopsis: The Young Master's journey to Paris leads to another showdown with the Queen's angelic butler and a painful parting of ways with someone dear to his heart. Can Ciel survive without the demonic assistance to which he's grown accustomed?
episodes.title: His Butler, Dissolution

episodes.synopsis: The Young Master arrives in London, only to find the city engulfed by flames. After an ominous warning from the undertaker, Ciel attempts to visit the Queen, but he's shocked by his treatment at the hands of the palace guards.
episodes.title: His Butler, Up in Flames

episodes.synopsis: Having regained the services of his Butler, the Young Master issues a chilling order to kill. Sebastian is eager to please, but this task will require a revelation of his true nature.
episodes.title: His Butler, Fluent

episodes.synopsis: Hoping for some favorable publicity, Ciel arranges a staged production of "Hamlet" for some orphaned children. What he finds instead is a valuable lesson about the futility of revenge.
episodes.title: His Butler, Performer

episodes.synopsis: Devilish butler Claude and his young master Alois must outwit a priest, a viscount and a conniving uncle with an eye on the family fortune.
episodes.title: Clawed Butler

episodes.synopsis: Our heroes accompany Lady Elizabeth on a desperate quest to find the legendary white stag, a mysterious creature believed to grant eternal happiness.
episodes.title: Solo Butler

episodes.synopsis: Women all over London are being burned alive, and it's up to Sebastian and Ciel to find the criminal before the town goes up in smoke.
episodes.title: Wench Butler

episodes.synopsis: When a nobleman's son is kidnapped, the Queen orders Sebastian and Ciel to deliver the ransom aboard a train. But it's a very complicated mission.
episodes.title: Terrorist Butler

episodes.synopsis: When Sebastian and Ciel attend a masquerade ball at the Trancy estate, it becomes clear that young master Phantomhive has lost his memory.
episodes.title: Beacon Butler

episodes.synopsis: When a demonic instrument wreaks havoc at the ball, Sebastian uses his unusual musical talent to set the mood for a party.
episodes.title: Bedewed Butler

episodes.synopsis: The "dance of death" is the scheduled entertainment when Sebastian and Ciel attend a private affair at the Trancy estate.
episodes.title: Deathly Butler

episodes.synopsis: A series of flashbacks revisits the tragic events of the night Claude and Alois first met. As their story unfolds, a devilish partnership is forged.
episodes.title: Divulging Butler

episodes.synopsis: The appearance of a new grim reaper leads to various mix-ups, and a string of mysterious eye-gougings plagues the streets of London.
episodes.title: Hollow Butler

episodes.synopsis: Sebastian must devise a way to reclaim Ciel without violating his Young Master's orders on a perilous mission requiring every ounce of his strength.
episodes.title: Zero Butler

episodes.synopsis: While a struggle rages deep within the mortal form of Ciel Phantomhive, Sebastian and Claude compete for the affections of their masters.
episodes.title: Crossroads Butler

episodes.synopsis: Hannah's devious game of deception forces Sebastian and Claude to agree to the unthinkable: a demon vs. demon duel where only one butler can win.
episodes.title: Black Butler

episodes.synopsis: Strange things are afoot when Sebastian sprouts rabbit ears and vanishes into a hole in the ground, and Ciel decides to follow the butler.
episodes.title: Ciel in Wonderland Part I

episodes.synopsis: As Sebastian leads you on a tour of the Phantomhive estate, you'll witness mysteries unfold and murderous intentions revealed.
episodes.title: Welcome to the Phantomhives

episodes.synopsis: Go behind the scenes and watch the cast of Black Butler discuss the ins and outs of making the show's second season via outtakes and candid footage.
episodes.title: The Making of Black Butler II

episodes.synopsis: As the young master tracks his rabbit-eared butler through Wonderland, he meets an enigmatic caterpillar and the Cheshire Cat.
episodes.title: Ciel in Wonderland Part II

episodes.synopsis: After freeing a butterfly from a spider's web, Alois Trancy faces difficult questions about himself and his relationship with Claude.
episodes.title: The Threads of the Spider¿s Story

episodes.synopsis: As he leads Reaper Association recruits through the process, Will reflects on the past, when he and Grell first teamed up to take the Reaper exam.
episodes.title: The Story of Will the Reaper
